SAINT.Name: Commemoration of the Holy Fathers of Seven Ecumenical Councils
Holy Martyr Theodotus of Ancyra and the Holy Seven Virgin-martyrs Alexandra, Tecusa, Claudia, Phaine, Euphrasia, Matrona, and Julia (+303)
Holy Martyrs Peter, Dionysius, Andrew, Paul, and Christina, who suffered under emperor Decius (+249-251)
Holy Martyrs Simeon, Isaac and Bachtisius in Persia (4th C)
Holy Martyrs David and Tarichan in Georgia (+693)
